name: Skinwalker (ShadowBand)
description:
On the trail of a brutal shapeshifting mystic, a Native tracker takes refuge from a storm, staying with a small boy and his mother during pioneer times at their frontier Inn. He enlist the help of the boy, who must rummage through the belongings of the other guest in order to find out which of them are human, and which of them are merely pretending to be...

In this narrative focused psychological horror, experience terror in a time before modern amenities softened the cruelty of our world, and by the light of the fire, discover the threat that walks among you -- or be overcome by the shapeshifting cryptid of Native American lore!

NOTE: Game supports BOTH KEYBOARD and GAMEPAD inputs!
